description: Numbers n such that 50*R_n + 7 is prime, where R_n = 11...1 is the repunit (A002275) of length n.
comments: Also numbers n such that (5*10^(n+1)+13)/9 is prime.a(16) > 10^5. - _Robert Price_, Nov 01 2014
links: Makoto Kamada, Prime numbers of the form 55...557.
Index entries for primes involving repunits
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 10 2000
